titleStmt.title: The late Lancashire vvitches A well received comedy, lately acted at the Globe on the Banke-side, by the Kings Majesties Actors. Written, by Thom. Heyvvood, and Richard Broome.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
Brome, Richard, d. 1652? aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper for Benjamin Fisher, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Talbot, without Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: The last leaf contains a song and an epilogue.
Running title reads: The witches of Lancashire.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
